description: Everyday Wisdom brings to you the power of positive changes in your life through self-motivation. You will get pearls of wisdom from Wayne W. Dyer, Ph.D., an internationally renowned author and speaker in the field of self-development. Wayne has authored 29 books, created many audio programs and videos, and has appeared on thousands of television and radio shows. Let the power of Wayne’s words of wisdom ring in a refreshing change into your life. Get the book today to usher in lasting positive changes all around you. Invite spring to stay, forever, in your life. This handheld adaptation is organized to provide you a hassle free navigation. Advanced search features help you to quickly locate anything specific that you want to read. A great buy for a great you.
